element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm calculates the total volume between two layers (DEMs). This calculations only make sense if the units used for the elevation itself are the same ones used for the x and y coordinates of the layer.
The algorithm calculated a positive volume (volume of upper layer above lower layer), a negative one (volume of lower layer above upper layer) and a total one (positive volume + negative volume)
Volume is calculated just within the analysis region.
If, for a given cell, one (or both) of the input layers have a no-data value, that cell is not computed.

element.name: LGRID
element.text: A Digital Elevation Model representing the lower level.

element.name: UGRID
element.text: A Digital Elevation Model representing the upper level.

element.name: VOL
element.text: A text contaning the calculated volume between the input layers
